attributes.action: To enhance democracy within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned do demand:

That Mike Smithson has suitable resources - paid via the poll/BBC-tax - to undertake his duties as guardian of our democratic process.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
